WorkItem.ClosedComment: We'll need more info to act on this, as breakpoints certainly work in the general case, there must be something specific you're doing to hit this issue. What version of TypeScript are you using? What version of Windows? What type of VS project? What's the code snippet where you're seeing this? Please re-open this bug if you can provide info to help us narrow down the issue here.
WorkItem.Description: I'm using Visual Studio Ultimate 2012 (version 11.0.60610.01 Update 3).  When I try to set a breakpoint in .ts files, I get an error message "This is not a valid location for a breakpoint."  I tried uninstalling and reinstalling TypeScript, but that didn't help.
